title: Photoshopped image shared as Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Adityanath drinking cow urine
subtitle: ﻿The posted shared as Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath drinking urine from a cow is a photoshopped image. In the original photo, he is seen drinking water from a hand pump
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A post with a photo of Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister, Adityanath drinking cow urine is being widely shared on Facebook. Let’s try to analyze the extent of truth in this post.



In the process of verifying the information about the shared photo, it was found that when the same photo was circulated on Twitter, a journalist has tweeted the original photo saying that the photo shared in the post is fake. In the original photo tweeted by him, no cow is visible and Adityanath is seen drinking water from a hand pump. When the two photos are compared with each other, it can be seen that the surroundings in both photos are the same.



When the portion of the cow in the posted photo was cropped and searched on the internet, the complete photo of that cow was found on this website. The back portion of the cow from that photo was used to create the photo that was shared in the post.

To sum it up, the photo of Adityanath drinking urine from a cow is a photoshopped image.



Did you watch our new video?
